description: This seminar-style course focuses on a specific art-historical topic, and students learn how to pursue art-historical practice beyond the introductory level. Topics change with each offering. Offered periodically. Prerequisite: at least one art history course or permission of the instructor.
name: Top: Latin American Art
notes: ALS-A is pending for this course.
prerequisites: Prerequisite: at least one art history course or permission of the instructor.
title: Topics in Art History
